techmeme.title: After a rough year, Intel says its $250 Arc B580 "Battlemage" GPU, which received near-universal praise from reviewers, has already sold out in most retailers (Sean Hollister/The Verge)
Analysis: as uncertainty looms over Japan's China-dependent chipmaking stocks, Sony, Nintendo, and Capcom have seen double-digit returns since Trump's victory (Bloomberg)
A look at Huawei subsidiary Yinwang, which sells hardware and software to carmakers, has a $16B valuation, and more than doubled its revenue to ~$655M in 2023 (Financial Times)
Experts say national security and immigration policies could deprive US companies of AI talent from China, which had 47% of the top AI researchers in 2022 (Yvonne Lau/Rest of World)
The UK Gambling Commission blocks eight illegal casinos using Roblox to lure children into online gambling, following a news investigation into the casinos (Sky News)
